about.title: About me
about.text: Hi! 👋🏻 My name is Sofia Dolcemáscolo and I’m from Córdoba Argentina. I’m a UX / UI designer. In my free time I like to listen to music and play Valorant ( Sometimes I do streams on Twitch ) I consider myself as a curious person that always want to keep learning (currently I’m reinforcing my knowledge on platzi) I like to watch YouTube videos related to UX/UI, and I have a kitty 🐈 named Sam that loves to be in camera behind me!

exp.title: Experience
exp.text_2: Some of my bests designs that I made using <bold>ProCreate</bold> for Ipad for Twitch streamers, I worked with clients from all around the world.
exp.text_1: Full Design system of an App created all by myself using <bold>Figma</bold> for prototyping and designing.
